name: PaulBunyanTV
0:
”Alexa, ask pb tv to watch the Weather Channel”
”Alexa tell pb tv to tune to channel 504”
”Alexa, ask pb tv to search for Kevin Bacon”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. b. tv
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Paul Bunyan TV skill lets you control your Paul Bunyan TV receiver with just your voice. You can ask Alexa to tune to a channel by channel number, call letters or name (i.e. Weather Channel). You can tell Alexa to watch a currently-airing program by title. Alexa can search for program names, actors or directors, eliminating painstaking entry of letter-by-letter search terms.
